metadata.title: CVE-2022-28284 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: SVG's <use> element could have been used to loadunexpected content that could have executed script in certaincircumstances. While the specification seems to allow this, other browsersdo not, and web developers relied on this property for script security sogecko's implementation was aligned with theirs. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 99.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
